attr.title: Aliens versus Predator
attr.desc: The three most ferocious species in the universe in a bloodthirsty battle for the ultimate prize: survival. Take your pick: be a Colonial Marine, a Predator or an Alien. Fight through suspense-filled environments: from starships and space stations to colonial bases and eerie planetscapes. One wrong move turns you from hunter to prey.
attr.inst: You will need the original files of the 1999 PC release copied to the ports/avp folder.
attr.inst_md: You will need the original files of the 1999 PC release copied to the `ports/avp` folder.
